NAME: Raunak Pandya
ABOUT:
I am thrilled to work as part of Azure Compute organization at Microsoft India Development Center and lead the Azure Container Compute IDC team. The team works on building on cutting edge technologies like Azure Arc for Kubernetes/ Azure Kubernetes Service, containers, Service Fabric on Azure & application modernization. 

I have a decade of experience in Microsoft working across Azure cloud and shipping various releases of Windows Server. I like me and my team to be solving complex difficult distributed systems problems and create solutions for the organization which can impact billions and learn new things everyday and not get constrained to just the work I am doing. I am a strong believer of teams distributed around the world and have experience running teams which work across geographies. 

Containers and micro services are reshaping the server world and how people write applications. At such a time, working for the Azure Container Compute team at IDC is super exciting and challenging. We are looking to hire engineers interested in joining us on this journey that is reshaping the technology industry.
